roleset.name: a mistake
roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01. Comparison to verb entry screw.01 (screw up). No VN Class, FN Bungling.

example.name: Sports, all args
example.text: There was a virtual consumer revolt over their screwups of the AFC and NFC championship games.
example.arg: of the AFC and NFC championship games
